revised_title: Sturm-Liouville Series and Integral Equations: Theoretical Developments
tldr: This article presents a study on Sturm-Liouville series of normal functions in the context of integral equations. The author proves a theorem and develops a formula for solving functions with given boundary conditions. The article also discusses the behavior of canonical Sturm-Liouville series, their convergence, and the extension of these theorems to more general types of series.
